nodes.text: The Five Star Entertainment was a theater in the city of Depatar, in the gas giant Genarius. It featured only late night shows, including A Rodian Love Story in 31 BBY.

That same year, Jedi Knight Alec hid in the theater for several days after stealing the blueprints of a weapon of mass destruction from the Dark Jedi Karae Nalvas. Alec had a ten-sentient security contingent with him in Box 113, and his personal pilot Danil protected the entrance as the theater doorman.
Several people sent by Nalvas eventually found Alec in the theater. However, Alec was able to talk them into joining him against the Dark Jedi.
